connect20/easystoreview.name: connect20/EasyStoreview

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/easystoreview.description: Easystoreview creation module is used to create storeview in a single step, and assigns locale to the created storeview.It also assigns all products,cms pages and blocks to all created storeview
